medical_history.chief_complaint: Presurgical psychiatric evaluation for bariatric surgery.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Ms. W has struggled with obesity since age 11, with variable weight loss success throughout her life. She reports binge eating episodes, primarily occurring two to three times per week over the past 2 years. Mood has been variable since the departure of her younger son from home, and she experienced a major depressive episode at age 35 after her mother's death.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, hyperlipidemia, impaired fasting glucose, history of major depressive disorder.
medical_history.family_history: Concerned about family history of type 2 diabetes.
